sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators, FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { myform: FormGroup = new FormGroup({}) constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { } createForm() { this.myform = this.fb.group({ title: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]), priority: new FormControl(null, [Validators.required]), done: new FormControl("", [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]) }); } demo() { this.title debugger; } get title() { return this.myform.get('title') as FormControl } get priority() { return this.myform.get('priority') as FormControl } get done() { return this.myform.get('done') as FormControl } ngOnInit() { this.createForm(); } name = 'TodoList App'; todos = [ { title: 'birthday', done: false, priority: 3 }, { title: 'birthda1', done: false, priority: 3 }, { title: 'birty', done: false, priority: 3 } ]; addTodo() { debugger const index = this.todos.findIndex(t => t.title === this.myform.value.title); if (index !== -1) { var newTodo = { title: this.myform.value.title, done: this.myform.value.done, priority: this.myform.value.priority, }; this.todos[index] = newTodo; } else { var newTodo = { title: this.myform.value.title, done: this.myform.value.done, priority: this.myform.value.priority, }; this.todos.push(newTodo); } } deleteTodo(todo: any) { this.todos = this.todos.filter(t => t.title !== todo.title); } UpdateTodo(todo: any) { this.myform.value.title = todo.title; this.myform.value.priority = todo.priority; this.myform.value.done = todo.done; } onSubmit() { console.log(this.myform?.value) this.myform.markAllAsTouched() this.addTodo() } }
Angular Reactive driven form
Title is required
First Name is required
Last Name is required
Date of Birth is required
Date of Birth must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
Email is required
Email must be a valid email address
Password is required
Password must be at least 6 characters
Confirm Password is required
Passwords must match
Accept Ts & Cs is required
